Text:
After installed, my antivirus McAfee detected a trogan called Artemis something.  And after I clicked start to begin the game, a pop-up asks you to add this game to your exception in your firewall and that this may contain a virus. 
-- Not taking my chances --

nceb3, Antivirus determine the program starting client as a rootkit. This is because the client checks your system for cheats and bots. Compilation made by me and I can vouch for each file - there is no virus.
http://forum.freela2.ru/topic/21-how-to-connect/ here you can find the guide =)
